tweet_text: Seems to be the case that that such a truncated edition being the only available in English for years of such a central work has led to a lot of misinterpretation and lack of understanding of Palamas' thought in the anglophone world.

tweet_text: There are beings who can get as high as any enlightened being ever got, sitting in the middle of Topeka, Kansas, or in New York, or in the middle of anywhere. It depends on your readiness, and that has to do with your karma or your readiness to get on with it all—Ram Dass
